content:
MaxMD was able to execute the following either in postman or a local version of our client app
Retrieved 4 EOBs from MITRE
Retrieved 10 EOBs from Optum
Retrieved 20 EOBs from CareEvolution
Retrieved 3 EOBs from 1upHealth
Retrieved 38 EOBs from Cigna
Retrieved 4 EOBs from IBM

CareEvolution:
Connected OK with 1upHealth (one issue with missing Coverage resource and had to work around no support for patient/*.read scope)
Connected OK with Cigna (one issue with pagination)
Failed to connect with Aetna (authorization page expect an audience different from the complete FHIR end point)
